@zuti12345 - try this fix mate: locate the nba2k12.exe in your program files, then right click it and select properties. go to compatibility and change it to Windows Vista (no service pack). click apply and OK. start playing again by running nba2k12.exe as administrator. hope this works.

@cluelessjez 

Step 4 means that you go on the disc that you mounted, you find the CRACK directory, you open it up, then you copy everything from it to where you installed the game on your harddrive. 

It'll ask you whether you wish to overwrite, simply click yes (as many times as neccesary) and that should do it. After that just click the game's exe icon and play.

Hope I helped you, if not.....ask again and I'll help. (if I can)

For those having installation prob. just use MagicDisc to mount the image and install the game, then use MagicISO to extract the crack to the game directory. EASY! 
 You can show your support to the community and by people like RELOADED and 3DM by simply seeding. NBA 2K12 is currently $20. Worth every penny.

@mrjericho

Extract the torrent file to any folder.

Use MagicDisc to mount the image. 

Install the game.

Use MagicISO to then extract the crack from the torrent files. In MagicISO, you will see the crack file with in the torrent data. Inside the crack file, simply highlight the entire contents and right click highlighted content and select "Extract". Choose or make a file where these item(s) will be extracted to.

Once done. Simply CUT and paste into the game directory. I mean CUT and paste...not drag and drop or copy and paste. Cut and paste.

Good luck, man!

@DonutKing7 you can find savegames folder by clicking on start button then click Run, and then type in there %appdata% , it should open you a folder named application data.
